tv_shows.description: Variety show from the 1960s featuring music and entertainment

tv_shows.name: The Lawrence Welk Show
tv_shows.description: Musical variety show popular with older audiences

tv_shows.name: The Arthur Murray Party
tv_shows.description: Dance and music show from the 1950s

conversation_starters: What was your favorite song when you were young?
Tell me about TV shows your family watched together
What foods remind you of home?
Do you remember dancing to music like this?
What was your neighborhood like when you were growing up?
Tell me about your favorite family recipes
What holidays did your family celebrate together?
Do you remember any special family traditions?
What was your favorite thing to do on Sundays?
Tell me about the music your parents liked
What was your favorite place to visit as a child?
Do you remember any special family meals?
What games did you play when you were young?
Tell me about your favorite childhood memories
What was school like when you were young?
Do you remember your first job?
What was dating like in your day?
Tell me about your wedding day
What was your favorite restaurant growing up?
Do you remember any special celebrations?

photos.title: Peaceful Garden
photos.description: Beautiful garden scene for peaceful viewing

photos.title: Family Dinner
photos.description: Traditional family gathering around dinner table

activities.name: Looking at Family Photos
activities.description: Gentle activity of viewing and discussing personal photos
activities.preparation: Gather photo albums or digital photos

activities.name: Listening to Familiar Music
activities.description: Playing songs from their era and cultural background
activities.preparation: Select appropriate music and comfortable seating

activities.name: Simple Cooking Together
activities.description: Making easy recipes that connect to cultural heritage
activities.preparation: Gather simple ingredients and microwave-safe dishes

activities.name: Gentle Hand Massage
activities.description: Soothing tactile activity with pleasant scents
activities.preparation: Comfortable seating and optional hand lotion

activities.name: Reading Together
activities.description: Sharing short stories or poems from their era
activities.preparation: Select familiar stories or nostalgic content

safety_notes.music: Keep volume at comfortable level, watch for emotional reactions
safety_notes.tv_shows: Choose content appropriate for their comfort level, pause if needed
safety_notes.cooking: Ensure all activities are safe, avoid sharp objects or hot surfaces
safety_notes.photos: Be prepared for emotional responses, both positive and challenging
safety_notes.conversation: Follow their lead, don't push if they seem uncomfortable

implementation_notes.usage: These fallbacks should ONLY be used when primary APIs return zero results
implementation_notes.selection: Choose items that best match the person's heritage and age when possible
implementation_notes.customization: Adapt any content to the individual's specific needs and preferences
implementation_notes.flexibility: Always be prepared to switch activities if something isn't working
implementation_notes.backup: Have multiple options ready in case first choice doesn't resonate
